data.title: NPC INDIA
data.text:
National Psychological Corporation (NPC)

National Psychological Corporation (NPC), established in 1971, has become the leading center for developing Indian psychological and educational tests. Over its 50-year journey, NPC has published more than 1100 tests, scales, and inventories. Additionally, it distributes over 100 tests in various psychological assessment areas by prominent Indian psychologists and educationists. We also publish and distribute textbooks, research and reference books in psychology and education. Our comprehensive offerings serve educational institutions, guidance and counselling centers, hospitals, industries, and professionals in psychology, psychiatry, and medicine, across India and neighboring countries. This extensive range of standardized Indian psychological tests and educational scales is available for diverse branches of human assessment.

Read More
